body.p: 1. Asaph’s son and a court official under King Hezekiah (2 Kgs 18:18, 26; Is 36:3, 11, 22). He was one of the officers sent by Hezekiah to deal with the Assyrians during the siege of Jerusalem.
2. Zimmah’s son from Levi’s tribe (1 Chr 6:21).
3. Levite, Obed-edom’s son and a gatekeeper of the sanctuary in David’s time (1 Chr 26:4).
4. Joahaz’s son and a recorder under King Josiah; he was one of the deputies overseeing the temple repairs (2 Chr 34:8).
